db:select.doc:name: select basket
db:select.db:dynamic-query: select b.quantity, si.sku_id, it.item_type_name, si.sku_name, si.sku_summary, i.item_brand, si.price, si.stock_quantity, im.url, imt.image_type_name from customer c, basket_item b, item i, item_type it, sku_item si, image im, image_type imt where c.id = b.customer_id and b.sku_item_id = si.sku_id and i.item_type_id = it.id and si.item_id = i.item_id and si.sku_id = im.item_sku_id and im.image_type_id = imt.id and c.id = #[xpath:/mes:getBasket/mod:CustomerId] and si.item_id = i.item_id and imt.image_type_name in ('#[xpath('/mes:getBasket/mes:ImageType/text()').text.replaceAll(",", "','")]')

expression-transformer.doc:name: to []

db:delete.doc:name: delete basket_item
db:delete.db:parameterized-query: delete from basket_item where customer_id = #[xpath:/mes:removeFromBasket/mod:CustomerId] and sku_item_id = #[xpath:/mes:removeFromBasket/mod:Sku]

db:insert.doc:name: insert basket_item
db:insert.db:parameterized-query: insert into basket_item(customer_id, sku_item_id, quantity) values (#[xpath:/mes:addToBasket/mod:CustomerId], #[xpath:/mes:addToBasket/mod:Sku], #[xpath:/mes:addToBasket/mod:SkuQuantity])
